value.title: Open your Power BI Desktop model in Excel with just one click (two methods)
value.excerpt: It is now possible to download your Power BI desktop data into Excel with a simple click and I am going to show you two methods in this video. Enjoy!  Erik Svensen tool: https://eriksvensen.wordpress.com/2020/07/27/powerbi-external-tool-to-connect-excel-to-the-current-pbix-file/  Changes in Power Shell

value.title: Power BI vs Excel: When you should use each tool
value.excerpt: Which tool is best? Power BI or Excel?  Well, it depends on what you are trying to do. Both tools have unique strengths and limitations and in this video I will try to show both.  Hopefully after watching this video, you will have a better understanding of both tools and will know when to use which depending
